# x963Representation

**Instance Property**

An ANSI x9.63 representation of the private key.

## Declaration

```swift
var x963Representation: Data { get }
```

## Representing the key

- **rawRepresentation**: A data representation of the private key.
- **derRepresentation**: A Distinguished Encoding Rules (DER) encoded representation of the private key.
- **pemRepresentation**: A Privacy-Enhanced Mail (PEM) representation of the private key.
